name: nvoy
description: Node.js implementation of an AWS metrics emitter.

scripts.int-test: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=personal AWS_REGION=us-east-1 NODE_ENV=development IS_DEBUG=true ORG=MyOrg jest __int_tests__ --coverage
scripts.service-metrics-emitter: cross-env AWS_PROFILE=personal AWS_REGION=us-east-1 NODE_ENV=development IS_DEBUG=true EMITTER_BATCH_DELAY=60000 ORG=MyOrg nvoy-service-metrics-emitter

author: Matthew Bill
